ch0112_10_hibiki/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! It sure is a 
perfect day for an adventure!
ch0112_10_hibiki/0101_0701_02_10:
I like walking, but sometimes flying through the sky
isn’t a bad way to travel, either!
ch0112_10_hibiki/7101_0701_01_10: Hey there! Isn’t this sygna suit slick?
ch0112_10_hibiki/7101_0701_02_10:
The design even matches Lugia! We’re in
perfect unison!
ch0112_10_hibiki/7101_0701_03_10:
The rush I get when adventuring in this sygna suit
is the best!
ch0112_10_hibiki/7102_0701_01_10:
The ocean and sky on Pasio are so beautiful,
it makes flying with Lugia even more fun!
ch0112_10_hibiki/7102_0701_02_10:
Maybe one day, Lugia and I can explore the
ocean together. What do you think? Is that a bit
too reckless?
ch0112_10_hibiki/7103_0701_01_10: Lyra is a childhood friend—and also my rival.
ch0112_10_hibiki/7103_0701_02_10:
So of course I don’t want to lose to her in
battle...
ch0112_10_hibiki/7103_0701_03_10:
We’re also about the same height, so we’re rivals
in that as well!
ch0112_10_hibiki/7104_0701_01_10:
According to the Pokédex, Lugia lives deep at the
bottom of the sea.
ch0112_10_hibiki/7104_0701_02_10:
Apparently, Lugia lives there to contain its powers
and not disturb its surroundings.
ch0112_10_hibiki/7104_0701_03_10:
That’s why I want to let it battle to its heart’s
content here on Pasio!
ch0112_10_hibiki/7105_0701_01_10:
It’s said that Lugia appears in a place called the
Whirl Islands in Johto.
ch0112_10_hibiki/7105_0701_02_10:
The huge whirlpools there are incredibly powerful
and loud.
ch0112_10_hibiki/7105_0701_03_10:
It’s a sight to behold! If you come to Johto, I’d be
happy to show you around!
ch0112_10_hibiki/1701_0701_01_10: Here, take this! I found it while flying with Lugia.
ch0112_10_hibiki/1701_0702_01_10: Use it when the time is right!
ch0112_10_hibiki/2501_0701_01_10:
I thought I had grown from all of my experiences
traveling in Johto.
ch0112_10_hibiki/2501_0701_02_10:
My Pokémon and I grew together. But then I came
to Pasio.
ch0112_10_hibiki/2501_0701_03_10:
And after watching you and all the other sync
pairs here, I realized I still have a lot more
room to grow!
ch0112_10_hibiki/2501_0702_01_10:
Do adventures ever end? No matter how
far I travel, there’s always something new
to discover!
ch0112_10_hibiki/2501_0702_02_10:
At this rate, I’ll still be flying around the world
when I’m an old man!
ch0112_10_hibiki/2511_0701_01_10:
I dunno if you’ve realized, but Pasio is an
extraordinary place.
ch0112_10_hibiki/2511_0701_02_10:
All of the natural features of this island were
built from scratch, but they come together
so beautifully.
ch0112_10_hibiki/2511_0701_03_10:
It’s a miraculous balance! As an adventurer, I find
it exciting!
ch0112_10_hibiki/2511_0702_01_10:
When I lie down on the ground on Pasio,
close my eyes, and feel the wind...
ch0112_10_hibiki/2511_0702_02_10:
I start to think that it doesn’t matter if it’s artificial
or natural.
ch0112_10_hibiki/2511_0702_03_10:
As long as nature, people, and Pokémon can all
thrive side by side...
ch0112_10_hibiki/2511_0702_04_10: To me, that’s what’s most important!
ch0112_10_hibiki/3001_0701_01_10:
When you feel groggy in the morning, try
stretching your arms out like a giant Pokémon
spreading its wings!
ch0112_10_hibiki/3003_0701_01_10:
Come on! There’s a whole world full of dreams
and adventures waiting for you just outside!
ch0112_10_hibiki/3005_0701_01_10:
At night, while I let my body cool down and rest,
my heart fires up for the next day’s adventures!
